targets.expr: sum(increase(tomcat_processingtime_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", protocol=~"$protocol", port=~"$port"}[$__interval:] offset -$__interval) / clamp_min(increase(tomcat_requestcount_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", protocol=~"$protocol", port=~"$port"}[$__interval:] offset -$__interval), 1)) by (job, instance)

increase(tomcat_processingtime_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", protocol=~"$protocol", port=~"$port"}[$__interval:] offset -$__interval) / clamp_min(increase(tomcat_requestcount_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", protocol=~"$protocol", port=~"$port"}[$__interval:] offset -$__interval), 1)
